Moose::Autobox::Scalar(3pm) User Contributed Perl Documentation Moose::Autobox::Scalar(3pm)

NAME

Moose::Autobox::Scalar - the Scalar role

VERSION

version 0.16

DESCRIPTION

This is a role to describes a Scalar value, which is defined as the combination (union sort of) of a String and a Number.

METHODS

"meta"
"print"
"say"
"flatten"
Flattening a scalar just returns the scalar. This means that you can say: 

  my @array = $input->flatten;
  # Given $input of 5, @array is (5);
  # Given $input of [ 5, 2, 0], @array is (5, 2, 0)
"first"
As per flatten.
"last"
As per flatten.

SUPPORT

Bugs may be submitted through the RT bug tracker <https://rt.cpan.org/Public/Dist/Display.html?Name=Moose-Autobox> (or bug-Moose-Autobox@rt.cpan.org <mailto:bug-Moose-Autobox@rt.cpan.org>).

There is also a mailing list available for users of this distribution, at <http://lists.perl.org/list/moose.html>.

There is also an irc channel available for users of this distribution, at "#moose" on "irc.perl.org" <irc://irc.perl.org/#moose>.
